data.text: @RapidFire_Pod December 2 2021 document though it hasn’t been updated with the most recent “misinfo” of adverse reactions?
@RapidFire_Pod But this is all totally normal and not authoritarian at all, right? 🧐
@RapidFire_Pod That’s just insane. I’d have to quit over ethical reasons

@RapidFire_Pod https://t.co/M7VqUB6P1g
Had to look for myself. Keep expecting that they will attack our ability to get/retain our licensure next. Nursing has changed so much and so quickly. 💔

@DoctorSekzi @RapidFire_Pod Many people found out principles don't feed a family.
Many still had their voice taken from them.
